# passwordRulesDescriptor

**Instance Property**

A string representing a set of password rules.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var passwordRulesDescriptor: String { get }
```

## Overview

To learn more about the syntax of password rules, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Security/customizing-password-autofill-rules].
